education.degree: Master’s degree in Software Engineering for Technical Computing Option

education.school: ESTIA: Institute of Advanced Industrial Technologies
education.degree: Master’s degree in General Engineering and Innovation

descriptions.description: Participated in the functional specifications of new functionalities, contributing to the design of the technical architecture.
Designed and implemented new features using React and TypeScript, delivering high-quality code that met project requirements.
Conducted thorough testing of newly written code, ensuring adherence to project methods and high standards of code quality.
Shared technical knowledge within the team and with the internal ecosystem, fostering a collaborative and supportive work environment.
Provided technical support to the internal community, helping them take control of different features of the application and resolve customer problems.
Co-managed the implementation of a new feature for home delivery, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and processes.
Designed the front-end of a web application as requested by the client, using React, Express, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.
Conducted user testing and gathered feedback to improve the user experience and increase customer satisfaction.
Maintained high standards of code quality and followed best practices in software development.
Learned basics in developing custom web applications using HTML 5, CSS, NodeJS, React JS, Bootstrap and MongoDB.
Contributed to the creation of scalable, dynamic and user-friendly web applications by utilizing various front-end and back-end technologies.
Assisted in mentoring newer interns and ensured they were comfortable with the codebase, improving the overall productivity and efficiency of the team.
